title: Drawing, "Design for a Caffeehaus at the Villa Albani, Rome", 1753–63
medium: Pen and brown and gray ink, brush and gray wash, graphite, on cream laid paper
markings: Marks: Strasburg lily. Tracing mounted below drawing support; shows decorated shield with crown and scrolls at top, Strasburg lily in center, with letters WR below.
creditline: Museum purchase through gift of various donors
description: Rocky landscape in front of building. Elevation of a one-story circular building decorated with pilasters, windows, and a central doorway which contains a fountain with two sphinxes. On lower level below fountain, a grotto with a standing female deity. Throughout the foreground, groups of men conversing. Cliff at left and center; building is in center of drawing behind cliff. Trees at right. Graphite borderline.

tombstone.epitaph:
Drawing, "Design for a Caffeehaus at the Villa Albani, Rome", 1753–63.
1753–63. Pen and brown and gray ink, brush and gray wash, graphite, on cream laid paper. Museum purchase through gift of various donors. 1901-39-2101.
